entry.title: Rumble Racing Star Game Preview: Is This Mario Kart With NFTs?
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin shares a first look at Delabs' upcoming lawn mower racing game Rumble Racing Star, which offers a large cast of quirky characters pulled from the worlds of Bored Ape Yacht Club, Pudgy Penguins, and more.

entry.title: Polygon 2.0 Aims to Provide 'Unified Liquidity' Across Ethereum Scaling Networks
entry.summary: The company said Polygon 2.0 will better connect separate blockchains and do away with wrapped tokens.

entry.title: Candy Digital Confirms Layoffs, Reveals Merger With Palm NFT Studio
entry.summary: The combined company will operate under the Candy banner, albeit with about 30 less employees amid layoffs this week.

entry.title: Germany’s BaFin Rejects Binance Crypto Custody License: Report
entry.summary: Binance maintains it is “committed” to working with regulators amid reports of BaFin denying its application for a crypto custody license.

entry.title: Why Coinbase Thinks the SEC Lawsuit Should Be Dismissed
entry.summary: The crypto exchange argued that the case falls outside the regulator's purview, as tokens are not investment contracts.

entry.title: Bitcoin-Friendly Damus Will Remain on Apple App Store—With ‘Core Feature’ Removed
entry.summary: Damus, a Bitcoin-friendly social media app, has won a reprieve in its battle to remain in the Apple App Store.

entry.title: Binance Loses European Banking Partner Paysafe
entry.summary: Binance's European banking partner Paysafe Payment Solutions will terminate support for the world’s largest crypto exchange in September.

entry.title: Lacoste Reveals Gamified, Tokenized Ecosystem for NFT Holders
entry.summary: The program, UNDW3, will reward engaged users with rarity-related NFT perks that the fashion brand says will increase those digital assets’ value.

entry.title: What Is a Bitcoin ETF, and Why Does Everyone from Blackrock to Fidelity Want One?
entry.summary: A Bitcoin ETF creates a simple, legally compliant way to trade the price of Bitcoin, accessible on markets that investors are already familiar with.

entry.title: Bitcoin ETF Race: Ark Amends SEC Filing to Match BlackRock
entry.summary: ARK added a surveillance-sharing agreement that appears to address potential market manipulation.

entry.title: Flirting With Algorithms: Men Are Harnessing AI to Win at the Dating Game
entry.summary: Algorithms are turning male suitors into virtual Casanovas—or at least they think so.

entry.title: Humans Are More Likely to Believe Disinformation Generated By AI
entry.summary: Even before GPT-4's launch, a new study finds disinformation created with GPT-3 was harder to detect than human-made falsehoods.

entry.title: It’s A 'Forgone Conclusion' That Ethereum Is A Commodity, Says Joe Lubin
entry.summary: The ConsenSys Founder says Gary Gensler may not be able to admit it, but that his hesitancy doesn’t matter.

entry.title: Why Did Citadel-Backed EDX List Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, and Bitcoin Cash?
entry.summary: Regulators appear to have said enough about these four digital assets to assuage Wall Street.

entry.title: TUSD Brags About Volume 'Milestone' After Stablecoin Depegs
entry.summary: The TrueUSD team touts its high trading activity while holders fret over troubles at custodian Prime Trust.

entry.title: Why Laguna Games Rejected 'Game of Thrones' to Make 'Crypto Unicorns'
entry.summary: "We didn't start this company [...] to just get jobs at WB," Laguna CEO Aron Beierschmitt said of the decision to make Crypto Unicorns.

entry.title: I Ate Ramen That Was 'Imagined' in the Metaverse—Here's What That Means
entry.summary: Chef Esther Choi is bringing noodles from the metaverse to the real world. Decrypt tried them and spoke to KPR's creators about their vision.

entry.title: Diablo IV Fashion Line Can Summon an AR Demon
entry.summary: The game-themed denim collection, available at a department store pop-up, focuses on Diablo IV's Lilith and her dark aesthetic.

entry.title: Why Laguna Games Turned Down 'Game of Thrones' for Crypto Unicorns
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin chats with Laguna Games about why the team chose to move away from an offer with WB Games to develop a Game of Thrones licensed title—and made Crypto Unicorns instead.

entry.title: Crypto Firms Swan, Coinbits Disclose Prime Trust Ties as Fallout Continues
entry.summary: While Swan got their users' funds out of Prime Trust in time, Coinbits has been forced to suspend most of its services.

entry.title: Digital Asset Manager 3IQ Adds Ethereum Staking to Two of Its Funds
entry.summary: The firm’s two Ethereum ETFs will now be the first investment vehicles to offer a staking service.

entry.title: Ex-Trader Ordered to Pay $54 Million CFTC Fine Over Crypto Fraud
entry.summary: Ohio resident Michael Ackerman was charged in 2020 for defrauding victims with a bogus crypto trading algorithm.

entry.title: FTX 'Reboot' Talks Begin and Send FTT Token Soaring 15%
entry.summary: Bankrupt crypto exchange FTX would likely rebrand as part of any restart, according to reports.

entry.title: Bitcoin Market Dominance Reaches 58%—Highest Level Since April 2021
entry.summary: That means Bitcoin now has a staggering $590 billion market capitalization.

entry.title: FTX Sues Ex-Compliance Chief Over 'Hush Money' Payments
entry.summary: Daniel Friedberg allegedly helped hold together a “house of cards” at the behest of FTX insiders.

entry.title: You Can Now Earn Bitcoin for Playing This Candy Crush Clone
entry.summary: REVIEW: Sweet Bitcoin won’t win any awards for originality, but it’s a fun iOS and Android game with real crypto earnings.

entry.title: MicroStrategy Buys More Bitcoin, Treasury Tops $4.5 Billion
entry.summary: The company is not shying away from buying “digital gold.” It spent $347 million buying more BTC in the second quarter.

entry.title: John Gerrard's 'World Flag' Art Blocks Drop Points the Finger at Nationalism
entry.summary: "World Flag," an NFT art collection presented by Art Blocks and Pace, also investigates the state of the global fight against climate change.

entry.title: Warner Music, Polygon Labs Launch Blockchain Music Accelerator
entry.summary: The program will offer projects working at the intersection of music and the blockchain access to funding, marketing support, and other resources.

entry.title: Mercado Libre Gives Mexican Customers Access to Pax Dollar Stablecoin
entry.summary: The e-commerce giant’s Mercado Pago app will give Mexicans access to digital dollars.

entry.title: Three Arrows Capital Liquidators Demand $1.3B from Bankrupt VC Fund’s Co-Founders
entry.summary: The co-founders of Three Arrows Capital, Su Zhu and Kyle Davies, recently formed new VC fund 3AC Ventures.

entry.title: Israel Seizes $1.7M From Crypto Accounts Linked to Iran’s Quds Force, Hezbollah: Report
entry.summary: The operation, the first of its kind, was made possible thanks to new tools developed by Israeli security agencies.

entry.title: Judge Rejects Sam Bankman-Fried's Bid to Dismiss Criminal Charges Over FTX, Confirms Trial
entry.summary: FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried faces trial after U.S. District Judge Lewis Kaplan rejected his bid to dismiss most criminal charges.

entry.title: Not Your Keys, Not Your Crypto: What to Know Before the Next FTX-type Meltdown
entry.summary: The popular adage, Not your Keys, Not your Coins, is making the rounds in the wake of the latest exchange meltdown. But what does it actually mean?

entry.title: Which Countries Have the Best Crypto Tax Laws?
entry.summary: “Europe is a massive hub for crypto due to its strict approach to regulation which made the industry flourish,” says Coincub CEO Sergiu Hamza.

entry.title: FTX Halts Sale of $500 Million Stake in AI Startup Anthropic
entry.summary: The bankrupt crypto exchange holds $500 million in Anthropic shares and is a coveted asset.

entry.title: Wall Street Is Coming for Crypto—Whether Early Believers Like It or Not
entry.summary: Some experts say all financial roads in the U.S., no matter how nascent, eventually lead to Wall Street.

entry.title: Azuki NFT Floor Plummets as Collectors Blast 'Identical' Elementals Art
entry.summary: After the huge Azuki Elementals drop, the new NFTs are trading under the mint price—and the originals are falling fast.

entry.title: Bank of England Says ‘Britcoin’ CBDC Might Not Be on a Blockchain
entry.summary: The English Central Bank is looking at a plethora of options for a CBDC it has yet to determine is viable.

entry.title: Mythical Games CEO John Linden on NFL Rivals Topping 1M Downloads
entry.summary: Mythical Games just raised a $37 million Series C1 round on the back of the early success of NFL Rivals, which has already topped a million downloads in two months. Mythical CEO John Linden joins Decrypt's Andrew Hayward to discuss the launch and impact of NFL Rivals.

entry.title: How Ava Labs Is Approaching Gaming on Avalanche
entry.summary: At 3XP, Ava Labs Head of Gaming Ed Chang sat down with Decrypt's Kate Irwin to discuss some of the biggest Avalanche-based games on the horizon and how the company is approaching and thinking about Web3 gaming.

entry.title: Ogimi Founder David Gull on Why AI Should Be Your Meditation Coach
entry.summary: Ogimi founder David Gull speaks with Decrypt's Jason Nelson about its AI-driven meditation guides and how the technology can enable a more unique, custom-tailored meditation experience for users.

entry.title: VaynerSports Gaming VP Discusses Web3 Content Creators, Decentralized Streaming
entry.summary: Darren Glover, VP of Gaming at talent management agency VaynerSports, sat down with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at the 3XP expo to discuss the challenges faced by Web3-centric content creators, the current state of the esports market, and how decentralized streaming platforms can challenge centralized leaders like Twitch.

entry.title: NYXL Co-Founder on the State of Esports and Crypto Gaming
entry.summary: Rohit Gupta, co-founder of esports team NYXL, chats with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at the 3XP expo to discuss challenges faced by the esports industry and opportunities and experiments in Web3.

entry.title: What Is GameBridge? Inside Shrapnel's Gaming Innovation
entry.summary: Marc Mercuri, Head of Platform for Web3 shooter Shrapnel, speaks with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at the 3XP expo about GameBridge, a feature that simplifies blockchain item composability and interoperability.

entry.title: Gods Unchained Executive Producer Discusses Epic Games Store Move
entry.summary: Daniel Paez, Executive Producer on Immutable X-based card-battler Gods Unchained, discusses the long-running NFT game's launch on the Epic Games Store and the opportunity it provides.

entry.title: 'Play-to-Earn Is Not Dead. It Will Never Die' Says Words with Friends Creator Paul Bettner
entry.summary: Words With Friends and Wildcard Creator Paul Bettner tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his perspective on Axie Infinity and Web3 games.

entry.title: Cross the Ages Game Review: A Tough But Rewarding Card Battler
entry.summary: Cross the Ages is a digital collectible card game that challenges players to duel online opponents—and you can even mint your cards as tradable NFTs. It's complex and difficult to grasp at first, but this mobile-first game has some serious strategic upside. GG contributor Ryan Gladwin puts Cross the Ages through its paces.

entry.title: "AI Is Game-Changing But Needs Fact-Checking": AlchemyAI Project Lead
entry.summary: In this interview, Decrypt's Jason Nelson chats with Alchemy product manager and AlchemyAI project lead Elan Halpern on blockchain analysis using ChatGPT, what AI means for better user experience, and the need to fact-check AI. Halpern also gives a demo of the new AlchemyAI ChatGPT plugin.

entry.title: Fractal Is Like an Arcade, Says Twitch Co-Founder Justin Kan
entry.summary: Justin Kan was a co-founder of Twitch and now works on Fractal, a Web3 gaming startup. Kan tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his new company and what he's up to.

entry.title: Are NFTs the Next SEC Target?
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin discusses the current regulatory climate in the U.S. with Gala Games' President of Blockchain Jason Brink.

entry.title: Collab.Land Co-Founder Said There Was No ‘Aha Moment’ When Launching DAO Toolkit
entry.summary: CCO and co-founder of Collab.Land Anjali Young explained at this year’s NFC Lisbon the origins of the crypto community tool kit, which industry niches are turning to its suite of products, and what’s next for the project since its token distribution event last February.

entry.title: Buying a Slice of H.R. Giger's 'Alien' Is Fine Art, Not Memorabilia: Particle CEO
entry.summary: With H.R. Giger's original "Alien" statue on full display at this year's NFC Lisbon, Particle CEO Harold Eytan told Decrypt that owning an NFT-ified slice of the piece isn't just for fans of the iconic creature and movie series but also for fine art collectors. Interested in owning a piece? Be prepared to cough up half an ETH for one of the 500 tranches of the digitized sculpture.

entry.title: Community Co-Creation 'Is a Big Step for Fashion Brands' Entering the Metaverse: BNV Founder and CEO
entry.summary: The founder and CEO of metaverse fashion platform BNV Richard Hobbs said big brands are still nervous to let fans and community members customize their favorite garments. Still, he believes that as long as you can meet a firm's commercial bottom lines while stirring engagement, there's nothing to lose.

entry.title: Standard Crypto VC Co-Founder on NFTs and Their Stigma in Gaming
entry.summary: Alok Vasudev is a co-founder of venture capital firm Standard Crypto. In an interview with Decrypt's Kate Irwin, he shares his thoughts on NFT marketing, NFT utility in gaming, and the stigma that pervades the industry.

entry.title: Ava Labs Announces Avalanche Arcad3 for Game Developers at 3XP
entry.summary: Ava Labs Head of Gaming Ed Chang shares news with Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the crypto firm's latest push to help traditional game developers break into blockchain gaming.

entry.title: ‘Like a Middle Finger to Western Culture’: YuYu Unpacks Inspiration Behind NFT Expo GAG
entry.summary: At this year’s NFC Lisbon, multimedia artist and photographer YuLiang "YuYu" Liu broke down how themes from traditional painting and BDSM informed his latest NFT exhibition called “GAG.” He also shared exclusively with Decrypt a yet-to-be-launched drop for fans of his work.
